page.title: 04Village Shop,Stevington
page.content: To run a village shop and post office in 1985 one must be a robust and imaginative optimist.There is much physical work like cleaning and lifting goods.Thought and research is required into the customers'likely needs and in the battle to survive against the multiples'ability to buy and sell at lower prices.The shop sells mainly foodstuffs but other useful items such as toiletries, paper goods and sewing needs can be purchased.Professionalism in merchandising, financial control and public relations is a "must".The shop is a social centre and a welcoming smile must always be ready.The shop serves the village people well.The post office is within the shop.
